gobblin.scheduler

Class JobScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • gobblin.scheduler.JobScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service

    public class JobScheduler
extends AbstractIdleService
    Gobblin job scheduler.

    The scheduler is a pure scheduler in the sense that it is only responsible for scheduling Gobblin jobs. Job state tracking and monitoring are handled by the JobLauncher.

    For job scheduling, This class uses a Quartz Scheduler. Each job is associated with a cron schedule that is used to create a Trigger for the job.

      • scheduleJob

        public void scheduleJob(Properties jobProps,
                        JobListener jobListener)
                 throws JobException
        Schedule a job.

        This method calls the Quartz scheduler to scheduler the job.

        Parameters:
        jobProps - Job configuration properties
        jobListener - JobListener used for callback, can be null if no callback is needed.
        Throws:
        JobException - when there is anything wrong with scheduling the job

      • scheduleJob

        public void scheduleJob(Properties jobProps,
                        JobListener jobListener,
                        Map<String,Object> additionalJobData,
                        Class<? extends org.quartz.Job> jobClass)
                 throws JobException
        Schedule a job.

        This method does what scheduleJob(Properties, JobListener) does, and additionally it allows the caller to pass in additional job data and the Job implementation class.

        Parameters:
        jobProps - Job configuration properties
        jobListener - JobListener used for callback, can be null if no callback is needed.
        additionalJobData - additional job data in a Map
        jobClass - Quartz job class
        Throws:
        JobException - when there is anything wrong with scheduling the job

      • unscheduleJob

        public void unscheduleJob(String jobName)
                   throws JobException
        Unschedule and delete a job.
        Parameters:
        jobName - Job name
        Throws:
        JobException - when there is anything wrong unschedule the job

      • runJob

        public void runJob(Properties jobProps,
                   JobListener jobListener)
            throws JobException
        Run a job.

        This method runs the job immediately without going through the Quartz scheduler. This is particularly useful for testing.

        Parameters:
        jobProps - Job configuration properties
        jobListener - JobListener used for callback, can be null if no callback is needed.
        Throws:
        JobException - when there is anything wrong with running the job

      • runJob

        public void runJob(Properties jobProps,
                   JobListener jobListener,
                   JobLauncher jobLauncher)
            throws JobException
        Run a job.

        This method runs the job immediately without going through the Quartz scheduler. This is particularly useful for testing.

        This method does what runJob(Properties, JobListener) does, and additionally it allows the caller to pass in a JobLauncher instance used to launch the job to run.

        Parameters:
        jobProps - Job configuration properties
        jobListener - JobListener used for callback, can be null if no callback is needed.
        jobLauncher - a JobLauncher object used to launch the job to run
        Throws:
        JobException - when there is anything wrong with running the job

      • getScheduledJobs

        public Collection<String> getScheduledJobs()
        Get the names of the scheduled jobs.
        Returns:
        names of the scheduled jobs
